schemas.description: Status of program execution within a channel.

contents.name: Id
contents.description: Unique numeric channel identifier.

contents.name: ActFeedrate
contents.description: Feedrate actual value.

contents.name: ActGFunctions
contents.description: Array of active G functions; there can be several G functions active at a time (modal and non-modal G functions).

contents.name: ActJogIncrement
contents.description: Active JOG increment.

contents.name: ActMainProgramFile
contents.description: Path of active CNC main program.

contents.name: ActMainProgramFileOffset
contents.description: File offset of active CNC main program file.

contents.name: ActMainProgramLine
contents.description: Line number of active CNC main program.

contents.name: ActMainProgramName
contents.description: Name of active CNC main program.

contents.name: ActMFunctions
contents.description: Array of active M functions: there can be several M functions active at a time (modal and non-modal M functions).

contents.name: ActModalOffsetFunction
contents.description: Active zero offset function.

contents.name: ActOperationMode
contents.description: Channel's active mode of operation.

contents.name: ActOverride
contents.description: Axis override actual value.

contents.name: ActProgramBlock
contents.description: Block of lines containing the previous, actual and subsequent lines of a CNC part program.

contents.name: ActProgramFile
contents.description: Path of active CNC program file (main or subprogram).

contents.name: ActProgramFileOffset
contents.description: File offset of active CNC program file (main or subprogram).

contents.name: ActProgramLine
contents.description: Line number of active CNC program (main or subprogram).

contents.name: ActProgramName
contents.description: Name of active CNC program (main or subprogram).

contents.name: ActProgramStatus
contents.description: Active channel program status

contents.name: ActStatus
contents.description: Active status of channel.

contents.name: BlockMode
contents.description: Block mode status (true in case of block mode is active, else false).

contents.name: CmdFeedrate
contents.description: Feedrate setpoint value.

contents.name: CmdOperationMode
contents.description: Channel’s mode of operation setpoint value.

contents.name: CmdOverride
contents.description: Override setpoint value.

contents.name: DryRunFeed
contents.description: Test feedrate.

contents.name: FeedHold
contents.description: Feed status (true in case of feed hold active, else false).

description: Base component for CNC specific drive componentes (e.g. axis or spindle).

contents.name: ActChannel
contents.description: NodeId of the channel object (CncChannelType) that administrates this drive to expose drive’s channel affiliation.

contents.name: ActLoad
contents.description: Drive load actual value.

contents.name: ActPower
contents.description: Drive power actual value.

contents.name: ActTorque
contents.description: Drive torque actual value.

contents.name: CmdTorque
contents.description: Drive torque setpoint value.

contents.name: IsInactive
contents.description: Drive inactive state (true in case of inactive drive, else false).

contents.name: IsVirtual
contents.description: Virtual axis (no hardware present; true in case of virtual axis, else fals).

comment: Model converted from OPC UA spec version 1.0.0 by Azure Opc2Dtdl converter v0.1.0.0 at 09/08/2025 15:50:08 UTC

contents.name: ActStatus
contents.description: Actual axis state.

contents.name: IsReferenced
contents.description: Axis reference state (true in case of successfully refereneced axis, else false).

contents.name: IsRotational
contents.description: Axis type (true in case of rotational axis, in case of linear type or other false).

contents.name: PosDirect
contents.description: Position actual value referring to axis' direct measurement system.

contents.name: PosIndirect
contents.description: Position actual value referring to axis' indirect measurement system.

fields.description: Position actual value referring to axis' indirect measurement system.

schemas.description: Turn direction of a CNC spindle.

contents.name: ActGear
contents.description: Gear stage actual value.

contents.name: ActOverride
contents.description: Override actual value.

contents.name: ActSpeed
contents.description: Speed actual value.

contents.name: ActStatus
contents.description: Actual spindle state.

contents.name: ActTurnDirection
contents.description: Turn direction actual value.

contents.name: AnglePos
contents.description: Spindle angular position values in case of interpolated (position controlled) spindle movement. Returns zeros in case of regular spindle operation (velocity controlled).

fields.name: AnglePos
fields.description: Spindle angular position values in case of interpolated (position controlled) spindle movement. Returns zeros in case of regular spindle operation (velocity controlled).

contents.name: CmdGear
contents.description: Gear stage setpoint value.

contents.name: CmdOverride
contents.description: Override setpoint value.

contents.name: CmdSpeed
contents.description: Speed setpoint value.

contents.name: VendorRevision
contents.description: Vendor revision of CNC interface. Format and content may be chosen by vendor.

contents.name: Version
contents.description: Version of CNC interface - corresponds to version of OPC UA companion standard.
